price: Saa nkorͻfoͻ no na wͻnam kwan tenenee a efiri wͻn Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ no soͻ, na saa nkorͻfoͻ no ne nkonimdifoͻ no.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَلَىٰ هُدٗى مِّن رَّبِّهِمۡۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ulāika ʿalā hudan min rabbihim wa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
